[WLS] NEW "Dallas Special" 1GB RAM, 1TB BW, 60GB Disk - $2.50/month ( 1Gbps Port! )

We Love Servers
Where Quality Meets Affordability!
Dallas Special!

This week, We Love Servers has brought online a new Node in our Dallas, TX hosting site facility. This is a limited time offer intended to help get the new server filled up,

as such we will only be accepting 5 orders for this particular HD promotion. Be sure to let us know if anyone has any questions.

____________________________________________


Dallas 1GB VPS

60 GB Disk Space Storage
600 GB Monthly Bandwidth (100Mbps) Open a ticket after order for a free upgrade to 1TB bandwidth & 1Gbps port!
1024 MB DDR3 RAM
1 IPv4 Address
SolusVM Access
Full Root Access
Choice of Linux OS's
Instant Setup
Self Managed

Price: $30/Yearly ($2.50/month!)

Link: https://core.weloveservers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=47

____________________________________________


BONUS:

All HD readers are entitled for free bonus upgrades:

Free upgrade from 600GB to 1000GB monthly bandwidth, and port upgrade from 100Mbps to 1Gbps.

To claim the bonus please open a support ticket/email support and mention you are from HD. We aim to have all VPSs upgraded within 24 hours or less.


Specifications of our VPS's:

  • Hosted on Intel Xeon Quad-Core E31240v2 processors with hardware RAID10 to ensure redundancy and high performance. All backed with robust infrastructure and a premium multi-homed network.
  • OpenVZ-based for minimal virtualization overhead
  • Instant VPS Setup (i.e. start using your VPS right away!)
  • 99.9% Uptime
  • Full Root Access (full control over your VPS!)
  • Additional IPv4 Addresses Available
  • Choice of Linux OS: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, more upon request.
  • Access to VPS CP to manage your VPS (ex: starting, stopping, rebooting server without needing to email support)

Network Information

  • Dallas, Texas (New!) - Test IP: 192.227.137.2


Purchase with Confidence

Don't take our word for it, some of our very own customers have spoken about our service. See for yourself on why WeLoveServers is the preferred hosting company among individuals.

sstrong63 said:
Prices are pretty low and it isn't uncommon for low prices to come with bad service. So far I can tell you that it is some awesome bang for the buck!

Christopher Boswell, WeLoveServers.net - Chief Operating Officer, has laboriously worked hard for me. It's obvious that they care their customers.
